metadata: This is a demonstration notebook walking through the key features of FAIMS3 Beta.

FORM1SECTION1.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION1: We can collect data about more than one thing. You decide what it's called, and what information you need to collect about that thing.

FORM1SECTION2.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION2: We can also store Structured and controlled data.

FORM1SECTION3.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION3: FAIMS3 offers input options for annotation and certain when the options are structured, but the data are fuzzy.

metadata.pre_description: This is a demonstration notebook walking through the key features of FAIMS3 Beta.

FORM1SECTION1.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION1: We can collect data about more than one thing. You decide what it's called, and what information you need to collect about that thing.

FORM1SECTION2.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION2: We can also store Structured and controlled data.

FORM1SECTION3.sectiondescriptionFORM1SECTION3: FAIMS3 offers input options for annotation and certain when the options are structured, but the data are fuzzy.

component-parameters.helperText: We have Text fields.
component-parameters.name: newfieldd9bd10b3

component-parameters.helperText: We have fields for storing Numbers which can have validation.
component-parameters.name: newfieldf1709f36

component-parameters.helperText: We have fields for storing Numbers which can have validation min 10 max 20.
component-parameters.name: newfieldf1709f36-val

component-parameters.helperText: We can also store Email addresses.
component-parameters.name: newfieldd5055225

component-parameters.helperText: We can also store multi line Text boxes for when you have a lot of data.
component-parameters.name: newfield89e38d1e

component-parameters.helperText: You can select your option from the dropdown
component-parameters.name: newfield349b217c

component-parameters.helperText: You can also select multiple options from the pick list
component-parameters.name: newfield331e4e64

FormHelperTextProps.children: If you only have a few choices, a Radio button might be the best option
If you need just one option, you might use a Check box

component-parameters.helperText: If the options in the dropdown aren't quite right, you can check the NOT SURE box and/or add a MARGINAL NOTE
component-parameters.name: newfieldd08c0bf8

FormHelperTextProps.children: If you cannot see you option, select OTHER, tap the icon to the right and enter it as OTHER.

component-parameters.helperText: You can organise your selections into groups with a Hierarchical picklist. You can choose to store the full path, where that's useful.
component-parameters.label: Hierarchical Picker (full path)
component-parameters.name: newfield43c567d1

component-parameters.helperText: Or just the end value if that is all you need.
component-parameters.label: Hierarchical Picker (only child)
component-parameters.name: newfield43c567d1-only
newfield7c35e08e
component-parameters.helperText: Click to save current location
component-parameters.label: Take point

component-parameters.helperText: We can take a point at a click of a button or draw points, lines and polygons on a map.
component-parameters.label: Maps
component-parameters.name: newfielddaa9b2f4

component-parameters.helperText: We can take photos and attach files.
component-parameters.label: Photos and Files
component-parameters.name: newfield58537432
newfield5b08f563
component-parameters.helperText: Choose a file
This is sub Title
component-parameters.label: Autoincrementer
component-parameters.name: newfield098f2977

component-parameters.helperText: Helper Text
component-parameters.name: newfield4840ba8b

component-parameters.label: html
component-parameters.html_tag:
• This is an example of included HTML
  • This can also include images

Here have example kittens from placekitten.com
component-parameters.name: newfieldb3d7f302

component-parameters.helperText: Identifiers are useful for related fields
component-parameters.label: Related Fields
component-parameters.name: newfielddcd32843

component-parameters.helperText: Tap the colour picker to select an RGB value from the array.
component-parameters.name: colour-picker

component-parameters.helperText: We have a date picker with a calendar prompt.
component-parameters.name: date-picker

component-parameters.helperText: And a calendar prompt with a timestamp.
component-parameters.name: datetime-local-picker

component-parameters.helperText: And one to select just the month if that is all you need.
component-parameters.name: month-picker

component-parameters.helperText: Select or Add new related record
component-parameters.name: newfield8d6bef1a
newfield34516263
component-parameters.helperText: Demo from project metadata + local count

component-parameters.name: hridFORM2
component-parameters.helperText: Demo from project metadata + local count
Create zero or more links
component-parameters.name: newfield86af7cd1

component-parameters.html_tag: By default synchronisation is always on. It can toggled on or off on the home page.
component-parameters.name: newfieldb4920b84

component-parameters.helperText: To break up a view, or guide the user
component-parameters.label: Custom headers and text
component-parameters.name: newfield20dd05c5

component-parameters.helperText: and can be placed anywhere on the page
component-parameters.label: Come in different sizes
component-parameters.name: newfield7d884f8a

component-parameters.helperText: If no value is entered, you can't save and sync the record. This must be at least 5 characters long!
component-parameters.name: newfield3bc6953e

validationSchema: I do not want to eat these green eggs and ham -- I want a longer string instead!
At least 5 characters, please. Not just ham..

component-parameters.helperText: If the number does not meet the validation rule min 10 and max 20, you cannot save and sync the record.. and we have custom validation messages if you edit the json
component-parameters.name: newfield30935e41

component-parameters.html_tag: By default records are saved as a Draft on your local device. They can only be synchronised once you have selected Save.
component-parameters.name: newfielddf61a75a

component-parameters.html_tag: You can't synchronise invalid data. FAIMS3 has two main types of validation: required fields and field-level controls.
component-parameters.name: newfield3562a076
